backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text map providing short descriptions of all frontend RV-experience-related components and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining color tokens, dark mode values, and global styling utilities.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML shell loading the React app via main.tsx into the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component rendering the RVExperience full-screen.
frontend/src/components/rv/ActionPlaybac: Displays sequential playback of selected checkpoint actions with progress indicators and a continue button.
frontend/src/components/rv/CheckpointOve: Modal for choosing 1–2 checkpoint activities with selection limits and action toggling.
frontend/src/components/rv/checkpoints.t: Defines checkpoint metadata including IDs, titles, and available actions with consumption values.
frontend/src/components/rv/JourneyHaltIs: Overlay shown during the forced halt issue with system-check hints and an 'Issue resolved' button.
frontend/src/components/rv/ProgressIndic: Top-bar indicator showing journey state, checkpoint progress, and halt alerts based on flow state.
Main controller component that renders different RV journey scenes based on flow state and triggers auto-advances using effects.
frontend/src/components/rv/scenes.ts: Provides scene metadata plus special scenes for halt issues and final destination.
frontend/src/components/rv/StartJourneyS: Landing screen with journey intro details and a button to start the RV experience.
frontend/src/components/rv/TravelScene.t: Displays a static scenic background with title and description overlay.
frontend/src/components/rv/TravelTransit: Shows a transition screen between checkpoints with loading animation and status text.
frontend/src/components/rv/TravelVideoSc: Loops a travel video or fallback image, tracks elapsed time, and triggers callback after a duration.
End-of-journey summary screen with trip stats and restart button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and status tracking. Wraps Dfinity AuthClient with custom options and exposes identity state to the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useRVFlow.ts: Implements a state machine for the RV journey flow, handling traveling, checkpoints, action selection, playback, issue halt, destination, and completion. Tracks internal resource consumption and provides helper transitions.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base/theme layers with custom warm-color variables, dark mode values, and text-shadow utilities. Applies global styling and sets up the app’s visual theme.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering. Imports global styles and mounts the App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors mapped to CSS variables, extended theme utilities, animations, shadows, and plugins. Enables class-based dark mode and sets content paths.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata describing a Flutter web app’s RV journey flow, resource mechanic, required images, and known issues. Acts as a centralized state and requirement definition file.
